description: A stylesheet defining CSS variables for theme management and styling for the Tic Tac Toe application's frontend.

classes.name: App
classes.description: Main application styling with responsive design and theme management.

classes.name: App-logo
classes.description: Styling for the application logo including animations.

classes.name: App-header
classes.description: Styling for the application header, including layout and background.

classes.name: App-link
classes.description: Styling for links within the application.

classes.name: theme-toggle
classes.description: Styling for the theme toggle button.
